00069   {
00071     CoverTree<MetricType, RootPointPolicy, StatisticType>* referenceNode;
00073     double score;

00078 
00080     bool operator<(const DualCoverTreeMapEntry& other) const
00081     {
00082       if (score == other.score)
00083         return (baseCase < other.baseCase);
00084       else
00085         return (score < other.score);
00086     }
